column5: Hi all, Went bass fishing from shore, not even a bite, but the dog is just as excited about ice out as I am!VIDEO LINKhttps://youtu.be/fxOyCPfLwYk
I believe the birds eye view can now be replaced with Dogs Eye view! Always enjoy watching your adventures, thank you for sharing!

Greetings,Thank you for sharing the video clip of playing "fetch" with your dog. It's easy to see that you have a great dog that enjoys being outdoors. The video clip showed the dog going in the water three times to retrieve the ball. I was wondering, on the fourth try did the dog say something to the effect "go get your own ball, that water is cold!"?Kindest regards.....
LOL...no way, he's a Lab....he would swim all day.
